participant_1.name: Sofia Martinez
participant_1.personality: Sofia is warm and nurturing, often finding joy in the little things like her family and pets. She has a curious mind and enjoys exploring new stories through books and movies.
participant_1.background: My parents are not into LARP, but they support my hobby. My last name is Spanish, but I tell people that it's Italian. I enjoy spending time with my family and pets, and I also like to read, play games, and watch movies. I also love orange juice. I work for a newspaper.

participant_2.name: Liam Johnson
participant_2.personality: Liam is creative and lively, often expressing himself through music and the arts. He has a fun-loving nature and enjoys connecting with others over shared interests.
participant_2.background: On the weekend, I might drum in a band or watch a movie about aliens invading the earth. I sell cosmetics in my spare time and help my sister Madonna with her beauty business. My dad is an airline pilot. I spent my summer eating burritos and traveling the world. I have two brothers.

content.text: Hello, I am interested in learning more about your hobbies.
I like to drum in a band and watch movies about aliens invading the earth. What about you?
I enjoy spending time with my family and pets, as well as reading, playing games, and watching movies.
That sounds like a relaxing way to spend your time. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have two cats. They are my best friends.
I love cats! I have two brothers and we always had cats growing up.
I would love to have more cats, but my apartment is too small.
That's too bad. Maybe you can get a cat when you move into a bigger place.
That's a good idea. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem. What do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially enjoy science fiction and fantasy.
I love science fiction and fantasy too! I'm currently reading the new Star Wars novel.
I have not read that one yet. I'm waiting for the next book in the series.
It's really good. I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
